Simple insert into table values{}  is still resulting in launching of job as earlier which can be avoided by optimizing that job to FetchTask.
I guess SimpleFetchOptimizer doesn't fire on insert queries and it doesn't handle UDTF which it now needs to handle. Can you please file a follow-up jira for it.
Are failures {{TestDbTxnManager2}} related? +1, if not.
[~ashutoshc], I created HIVE-18451 to extend the FetchOptimizer. I fixed {{TestDbTxnManager2}} (changes expected after this patch) and pushed to master.
This jira is resolved and released with Hive 3.0 If you find an issue with it, please create a new jira.
